description: Psalms of assurance: an analysis of the formation and function of Psalms of Solomon in Second Temple Judaism. Doctoral thesis, Durham University. FAULKNER, ANNE (2009) THE EMERGENCE OF GENTILE LEADERSHIP AND THE JERUSALEM CONFERENCE:A SOCIO-PSYCHOLOGICAL APPROACH TO THE GROUP DYNAMICS OF THE PARTICIPATION OF GENTILE BELIEVERS IN THE EARLY CHURCH.
title: Psalms of assurance: an analysis of the formation and function of Psalms of Solomon in Second Temple Judaism
